title: [1.12.2-1.7.10][lightningcraft-雷电工艺][BS]大自然最危险的武器
author: jmjmggg
txt_content:
本帖最后由 jmjmggg 于 2018-7-13 13:01 编辑 
作者授权图




QQ图片20170520130655.png (28.46 KB, 下载次数: 6)

下载附件

2017-6-17 15:28 上传





这个MOD可以干什么？（原文）Make air terminals and lightning power cells to store LE (Lightning Energy) Swing golf clubs in the air to summon lightning to store at first, but then find better methods of doing so Make some electricium by striking an iron ingot, gold ingot, and diamond on the ground with lightning Use the LE to run machines and create powerful materials, such as electricium, skyfather, and mystic Machines include a faster furnace, a crusher, an infusion table, a device that can be used to move enchantments between items, and more Transmit your LE from base to another location if you so desire with transmitters and receivers Convert your stored lightning energy to and from RF / TESLA Electricium is a metal that is a tier above diamond, as it is also made by infusing an iron ingot with a gold ingot and a diamond. Swords and Hammers made from this metal have a chance to summon lightning on foes you strike. Make Kinetic tools, armor, and more that run on mobile lightning power The Skyfather material has physical properties slightly above Electricium, but its electrical properties are well beyond it. Skyfather tools have auto-smelting, the skyfather hoe has quick farm (hoe a 1x3 row at a time, use again to get a 5x5 hoed area), and the sword and hammer have a greater chance to strike your foes with lightning. Turns out, the gods don't like mortals having such control over mother nature, so they've sent ones to deal with you, starting you on your divine journey to the Underworld...
这个MOD可以干什么？[汉化]
做出避雷针然后就可以存储LE能量在LE存储器里挥动高尔夫球杆生成雷电，然后存储起来，然后就会发现更好的方法来做这个事用铁锭，金锭和钻石做一点雷电锭用LE来驱动强大的机器，制造更强大的金属，像雷电锭，天空锭，神秘锭。机器有一个更快的熔炉，一个粉碎机，一个注入台和一个转移附魔机。用发射器和接收器无线传输LE能量双向转换LE，RF，TELSA能量雷电锭比钻石高一个等级,用雷电锭做出来的剑和锤有几率召唤出雷电在打怪的时候电力套要LE驱动天空锭比雷电锭强，有雷电锭的所有功能，天空工具增加了自动冶炼，锄头增加的快速耕地（第一次耕1X3的地，第二次就是5X5），剑和锤触发雷电的几率大大增加。神不希望一个凡人能如此强大，他会派人来解决你的，去冥界探险吧。。。。。MOD图片                                                
MOD教程B站某位UP主做的，感谢这位大大:一天世界君part1：http://www.bilibili.com/video/av10284414part2：http://www.bilibili.com/video/av10400001part3:http://www.bilibili.com/video/av10423634
MOD联动Chisel【凿子】
JEI
TESLA
TiC【匠魂】
WAILA
下载原帖下载地址度盘：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1qYPntvQ（汉化）
本贴更新日志

2017/9/24 开始记录更新2018/5/1 更新至2.9.1，MC1.12.2
